comment.author: 30085166@N00
comment._content: Thomas Riley Marshall (1854–1925), 28th Vice President of the United States (1913–1921.) He was a native of Indiana and served the state as Governor from 1909 to 1913. Short but tolerable Wikipedia biography. His wife, Lois Irene Kimsey Marshall (b1979), was 19 years his junior.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thanks!  We'll add the additional identification to the source data and reload the description.
